CAMPAIGN_NAME: Western Barents Sea Greenland halibut genetic diversity and heavy metals study
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Commercial trawling using M/Tr Polaris vessel. Samples collected during Greenland halibut spawning migration period.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Western Barents Sea Greenland halibut genetic diversity and heavy metals study
Western Barents Sea Greenland halibut genetic diversity and heavy metals study
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Samples lyophilized and homogenized. Approximately 0.30 g of lyophilized sample weighed into Teflon beaker. 4 cm³ of HNO₃(s.p) added and sample subjected to closed vessel microwave digestion (UniClever BM-1z, Plazmatronika, Poland) at maximal power of 100%, pressure 70 atm, hold 10 min, cooling 20 min.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Western Barents Sea Greenland halibut genetic diversity and heavy metals study
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Flame atomic absorption spectrometry using TJA Solutions Model SOLAAR M6 atomic absorption spectrometer with deuterium lamp and Zeeman effect background correction. Cu determined at 324.8 nm wavelength in air-acetylene flame.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Western Barents Sea Greenland halibut genetic diversity and heavy metals study
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Electrothermal atomic absorption spectrometry using Zeeman background correction. Cu determined at 324.8 nm with Mg(NO₃)₂ matrix modifier. Temperature program: drying 100°C/30s, pyrolysis 850°C/20s, atomization 2100°C/3s, cleaning 2500°C/3s.
